unnormalised: Chai just got a little pricier, folks! Your monthly cooking gas bill is set to see a bump. Govt. sources hinted at a possible Rs. 50 hike in domestic LPG cylinder prices from next week. This comes right after Diwali, making many households, especially in cities like Delhi and Mumbai, feel the pinch.
normalised: Chai just got a little pricier, folks! Your monthly cooking gas bill is set to see a bump. Government sources hinted at a possible rupee fifty hike in domestic L P G cylinder prices from next week. This comes right after Diwali, making many households, especially in cities like Delhi and Mumbai, feel the pinch.

unnormalised: "It's becoming tough to manage the budget," laments Mrs. Sharma from Karol Bagh, whose small tailoring shop operates out of a 200 sq ft space. "Every little increase hurts."
normalised: "It's becoming tough to manage the budget," laments Missus Sharma from Karol Bagh, whose small tailoring shop operates out of a two hundred square feet space. "Every little increase hurts."

unnormalised: Oil marketing companies like Bharat Petroleum are citing rising international crude oil prices and supply chain disruptions as reasons for the potential increase. Dr. Verma, an economist from JNU, suggests the government might be trying to slowly reduce subsidies.
normalised: Oil marketing companies like Bharat Petroleum are citing rising international crude oil prices and supply chain disruptions as reasons for the potential increase. Doctor Verma, an economist from J N U, suggests the government might be trying to slowly reduce subsidies.

unnormalised: While a final decision is still pending, keep an eye out for that notification! Will this affect your Diwali sweets budget next year? Only time will tell. For now, maybe explore some delicious daal recipes that require less cooking time? Every little bit helps!
normalised: While a final decision is still pending, keep an eye out for that notification! Will this affect your Diwali sweets budget next year? Only time will tell. For now, maybe explore some delicious daal recipes that require less cooking time? Every little bit helps!
